revised_title: Laser Magnetic Resonance Spectra Analysis of NH2 Molecule
tldr: The authors studied the laser magnetic resonance spectra of the NH2 molecule using 15 far-infrared laser frequencies. They analyzed the effective Hamiltonian and the spin-rotation interaction, comparing their findings with other techniques. The results provide insights into the molecular parameters and help in understanding the behavior of the NH2 molecule under varying magnetic fields.
